net.jxta.impl.content
Interface ModuleLifecycleManagerListener

All Superinterfaces:
ModuleLifecycleListener
public interface ModuleLifecycleManagerListener
extends ModuleLifecycleListener

This interface defines the API which must be implemented to be notified of events and problems created while managing a list of subordinate Module lifecycles.

Method Summary
 void moduleDisabled(ModuleLifecycleManager manager, ModuleLifecycleTracker subject)
          Called when a Module has reported that it is disabled.
 void moduleStalled(ModuleLifecycleManager manager, ModuleLifecycleTracker subject)
          Called when a Module has stalled.
 
Methods inherited from interface net.jxta.impl.content.ModuleLifecycleListener
moduleLifecycleStateUpdated, unhandledPeerGroupException
 

Method Detail

moduleStalled

void moduleStalled(ModuleLifecycleManager manager,
                   ModuleLifecycleTracker subject)
Called when a Module has stalled. That is, when a Module has not been able to make forward progress while loading because it's startApp method has not been returning Module.START_OK.

Parameters:
manager - the manager which has detected the stalled Module
subject - the tracker monitoring the stalled Module

moduleDisabled

void moduleDisabled(ModuleLifecycleManager manager,
                    ModuleLifecycleTracker subject)
Called when a Module has reported that it is disabled. This occurs when a Module start attempt is made that results in a Module.START_DISABLED value. This module will be discarded and dereferenced by the ModuleLifecycleManager immediately after this event is processed.

Parameters:
manager - the manager which has detected the disabled Module
subject - the tracker monitoring the stalled Module
